author: DistroTube
description:
So I've had the same installation of Arch running for about 2-3 years now, I was experiencing some serious issues, especially with recording audio.  So I decided to hop away from Arch and move to CachyOS.  And...I still had issues. 

REFERENCED:
► https://cachyos.org/
